about_the_game:
Welcome to the captivating world of "Carpe Dino: Seize the Date," the dinosaur dating simulator!

You, a peaceful Ankylosaurs, lived in your swamps for the last few decades until your routine was roughly interrupted...

A huge Rock now hangs in the sky, and rumors suggest that only a grand journey away from home might save the dinos. However, such a journey cannot be undertaken alone — you'll have to find a companion for the adventure.

So, what exactly awaits you on the twisted roads of ancient Pangea?

✦ Four Romanceable Characters

As long as you find dinosaurs romanceable, yes.

✦ Four Non-Romanceable Characters (NPCs = NRCs, hah!)

Talk to the insects, plants, and other ancient creatures to learn more about the world around you and guide your way through the burning lands of Pangea.

✦ 3+ hours of gameplay

A visual novel at the core and a topping of several arcade-like mini-games will ensure a rich experience.

✦ 10 possible endings: Live and Die, Save or Abandon

On your way, you will face multiple dangers and inspire your mates to stand against them. Believe little old me, your happily-ever-after won’t come to you easily!

Talk to everyone you can, choose your favorites to accompany you on the run, protect them, and be protected. If you play your cards right, you might even survive the Great Dying :>

.

.

.

Though the chances aren't too high.

content_descriptors.notes:
Since the game is a Dating Sim, the game text content is suitable for the age group of 14+.
It includes flirting and romance references as well as descriptions of dramatic or violent events related to the dinosaur's behavior and the Great Dying topic.

Welcome to the captivating world of "Carpe Dino: Seize the Date," the dinosaur dating simulator!

You, a peaceful Ankylosaurs, lived in your swamps for the last few decades until your routine was roughly interrupted...

A huge Rock now hangs in the sky, and rumors suggest that only a grand journey away from home might save the dinos. However, such a journey cannot be undertaken alone — you'll have to find a companion for the adventure.

So, what exactly awaits you on the twisted roads of ancient Pangea?

name: Carpe Dino: Seize the Date

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 Pro
  • Processor: Intel
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: “Carpe Dino: Seize the Date” is a journey back in time with a romantic twist. Face the dangers of ancient Pangea, get involved in a few intrigues, and choose a mate to get through the Great Dying. Be ready to decide the future of the entire Dinosaur world… World, which is wider than you imagined.
